item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqTape3PhyDrvCleanTapeReplace
item.description: Tape Drive Cleaning Tape Needs Replacing;The agent has detected that an autoloader tape unit hasa cleaning tape that has been fully used and therefore needs tobe replaced with a new cleaning tape;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqTape3PhyDrvCleaningRequired
item.description: Tape Drive Cleaning Required trap;The agent has detected a tape drive that needs to havea cleaning tape inserted and run; This will cause the tape driveheads to be cleaned;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqTape3LibraryOkay
item.description: Tape Library OkayThe agent has detected that an autoloader unit hasrecovered from errors;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqTape3LibraryFailed
item.description: Tape Library ErrorThe agent has detected that an autoloader unit hasan encountered an error;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqTape3LibraryDoorOpen
item.description: Tape Library Door OpenThe agent has detected that the door on an autoloaderis open so the unit is not operational;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqTape3LibraryDoorClosed
item.description: Tape Library Door ClosedThe agent has detected that the door on a an autoloaderhas closed;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqTape3LibraryDegraded
item.description: Tape Library DegradedThe agent has detected that an autoloader unit isin a degraded condition;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2UnauthorizedLoginAttempts
item.description: Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out Unauthorized Login Attempts;The Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out firmware has detectedunauthorized login attempts;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2ServerReset
item.description: Server Reset Detected;The Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out firmware has detected a server reset;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2ServerPowerOutage
item.description: Server Power Outage;The Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out firmware has detected serverpower failure;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2ServerPowerOnFailure
item.description: A request was made to power on the server; however the server could not be powered on due to a failure condition;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2ServerPowerOn
item.description: The server has been powered on; This will be sent once a server power on transition has occurred;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2ServerPowerOff
item.description: The server has been powered off; This will be sent once the server has been powered off; either by OS; or the power button;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2ServerFatalError
item.description: Server Fatal Error Detected;The Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out firmware hasdetected a server fatal error;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2SelfTestError
item.description: Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out Self Test Error;The Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out firmware has detected a RemoteInsight self test error;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2SecurityOverrideEngaged
item.description: Security Override Engaged;The Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out firmware has detected the security override jumperhas been toggled to the engaged position;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2SecurityOverrideDisengaged
item.description: Security Override Disengaged;The Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out firmware has detected the security override jumperhas been toggled to the disengaged position;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2NicLinkUp
item.description: The iLO NIC Link is Up;The Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out firmware hasdetected the presence of network link;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2NicLinkDown
item.description: The iLO NIC Link is Down;The Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out firmware hasdetected the loss of network link;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2MouseCableDisconnected
item.description: Mouse Cable Disconnected;The Remote Insight mouse cable has been disconnected;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2LogsFull
item.description: Logs Full;The Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out firmware has detected the logs are full;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2KeyboardCableDisconnected
item.description: Keyboard Cable Disconnected;The Remote Insight keyboard cable has been disconnected;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2IrsCommFailure
item.description: The iLO to Insight Remote Support or Insight Online communication failed;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2InterfaceError
item.description: Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Out Interface Error;The host OS has detected an error in the Remote Insight; Integrated Lights;Outinterface; The firmware is not responding;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2ExternalPowerCableDisconnected
item.description: External Power Cable Disconnected;The Remote Insight external power cable has been disconnected;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2BatteryFailed
item.description: Remote Insight Battery Failed;The Remote Insight battery has failed and needs to be replaced;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSm2BatteryDisconnected
item.description: Remote Insight Battery Disconnected;The Remote Insight battery cable has been disconnected;

item.description: Physical Drive Status Change;The agent has detected a change in the status of aSCSI physical drive; The current physical drivestatus is indicated in the cpqScsiPhyDrvStatus variable;

item.description: Logical Drive Status Change;The Storage Agent has detected a change in the status of aSCSI logical drive; The current logical drive status isindicated in the cpqScsiLogDrvStatus variable;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqScsi3CntlrStatusChange

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqScsi2PhyDrvStatusChange
item.description: Physical Drive Status Change;The agent has detected a change in the status of aSCSI physical drive; The current physical drivestatus is indicated in the cpqScsiPhyDrvStatus variable;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqScsi2LogDrvStatusChange
item.description: Logical Drive Status Change;The agent has detected a change in the Logical DriveStatus of a SCSI logical drive; The current logicaldrive status is indicated by the cpqScsiLogDrvStatus variable;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqScsi2CntlrStatusChange

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSasPhyDrvStatusChange
item.description: Physical Drive Status Change;The Storage Agent has detected a change in the status of aSAS or SATA physical drive; The current physical drive statusis indicated in the cpqSasPhyDrvStatus variable;User Action; If cpqSasPhyDrvStatus is 'predictiveFailure(;)';'failed(;)'; 'ssdWearOut(;;)' or 'notAuthenticated(;;)';replace the drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSasPhyDrvSSDWearStatusChange
item.description: Solid State Disk Wear Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in theSSD wear status of a SAS or SATA physical drive; The variablecpqSasPhyDrvSSDWearStatus indicates the current SSD wear status;User Action; If cpqSasPhyDrvSSDWearStatus is 'ssdWearOut(;)';replace the drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqSasLogDrvStatusChange
item.description: Logical Drive Status Change;The Storage Agent has detected a change in the status of aSAS or SATA logical drive; The current logical drive status isindicated in the cpqSasLogDrvStatus variable;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNicVirusLikeActivityStopped
item.description: This trap will be sent when the Virus Throttle FilterDriver no longer detects virus like activity;User Action; None required;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNicVirusLikeActivityDetected
item.description: This trap will be sent when the Virus Throttle FilterDriver detects virus like activity;User Action; The system reporting this trap requiresimmediate attention;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNicRedundancyReduced
item.description: This trap will be sent any time a physical adapter in alogical adapter group changes to the Failed condition; butat least one physical adapter remains in the OK condition;;This can be caused by loss of link due to a cable beingremoved from the adapter or the Hub or Switch; Internaladapter; Hub; or Switch failures can also cause thiscondition;User Action; Check the cables to the adapter and the Hub orSwitch; If no cable problems are found; the adapter; Hub;or Switch may need replacement;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNicRedundancyIncreased
item.description: This trap will be sent any time a previously failed physicaladapter in a connected logical adapter group returns to the OK condition; This trap is not sent when a logical adaptergroup has connectivity restored from a Failed condition; ThecpqNicConnectivityRestored trap is sent instead;This can be caused by replacement of a faulty cableor re;attaching a cable that was unplugged;User Action; None required;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNicConnectivityRestored
item.description: This trap will be sent any time connectivity is restoredto a logical adapter; This occurs when the physicaladapter in a single adapter configuration returns tothe OK condition or at least one physical adapterin a logical adapter group returns to the OK condition;This can be caused by replacement of a faulty cableor re;attaching a cable that was unplugged;User Action; None required;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNicConnectivityLost
item.description: This trap will be sent any time the status of a logicaladapter changes to the Failed condition; This occurswhen the adapter in a single adapter configuration fails;or when the last adapter in a redundant configuration fails;This can be caused by loss of link due to a cable beingremoved from the adapter or the Hub or Switch; Internaladapter; Hub; or Switch failures can also cause thiscondition;User Action; Check the cables to the adapter and the Hub orSwitch; If no cable problems are found; the adapter; Hub;or Switch may need replacement;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNic3RedundancyReduced
item.description: This trap will be sent any time a physical adapter in alogical adapter group changes to the Failed condition; butat least one physical adapter remains in the OK condition;;This can be caused by loss of link due to a cable beingremoved from the adapter or the Hub or Switch; Internaladapter; Hub; or Switch failures can also cause thiscondition;User Action; Check the cables to the adapter and the Hub orSwitch; If no cable problems are found; the adapter; Hub;or Switch may need replacement;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNic3RedundancyIncreased
item.description: This trap will be sent any time a previously failed physicaladapter in a connected logical adapter group returns to the OKcondition; This trap is not sent when a logical adaptergroup has connectivity restored from a Failed condition; ThecpqNicConnectivityRestored trap is sent instead;This can be caused by replacement of a faulty cableor re;attaching a cable that was unplugged;User Action; None required;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNic3ConnectivityRestored
item.description: This trap will be sent any time connectivity is restoredto a logical adapter; This occurs when the physicaladapter in a single adapter configuration returns tothe OK condition or at least one physical adapterin a logical adapter group returns to the OK condition;This can be caused by replacement of a faulty cableor re;attaching a cable that was unplugged;User Action; None required;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNic3ConnectivityLost
item.description: This trap will be sent any time the status of a logicaladapter changes to the Failed condition; This occurswhen the adapter in a single adapter configuration fails;or when the last adapter in a redundant configuration fails;This can be caused by loss of link due to a cable beingremoved from the adapter or the Hub or Switch; Internaladapter; Hub; or Switch failures can also cause thiscondition;User Action; Check the cables to the adapter and the Hub orSwitch; If no cable problems are found; the adapter; Hub;or Switch may need replacement;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNic2RedundancyReduced
item.description: This trap will be sent any time a physical adapter in alogical adapter group changes to the Failed condition; butat least one physical adapter remains in the OK condition;;This can be caused by loss of link due to a cable beingremoved from the adapter or the Hub or Switch; Internaladapter; Hub; or Switch failures can also cause thiscondition;User Action; Check the cables to the adapter and the Hub orSwitch; If no cable problems are found; the adapter; Hub;or Switch may need replacement;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNic2RedundancyIncreased
item.description: This trap will be sent any time a previously failed physicaladapter in a connected logical adapter group returns to the OKcondition; This trap is not sent when a logical adaptergroup has connectivity restored from a Failed condition; ThecpqNicConnectivityRestored trap is sent instead;This can be caused by replacement of a faulty cableor re;attaching a cable that was unplugged;User Action; None required;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNic2ConnectivityRestored
item.description: This trap will be sent any time connectivity is restoredto a logical adapter; This occurs when the physicaladapter in a single adapter configuration returns tothe OK condition or at least one physical adapterin a logical adapter group returns to the OK condition;This can be caused by replacement of a faulty cableor re;attaching a cable that was unplugged;User Action; None required;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqNic2ConnectivityLost
item.description: This trap will be sent any time the status of a logicaladapter changes to the Failed condition; This occurswhen the adapter in a single adapter configuration fails;or when the last adapter in a redundant configuration fails;This can be caused by loss of link due to a cable beingremoved from the adapter or the Hub or Switch; Internaladapter; Hub; or Switch failures can also cause thiscondition;User Action; Check the cables to the adapter and the Hub orSwitch; If no cable problems are found; the adapter; Hub;or Switch may need replacement;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqIdeLogicalDriveStatusChange
item.description: IDE Logical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of an IDE logical drive; The variablecpqIdeLogicalDriveStatus indicates the current logical drivestatus;User Action; If the logical drive status is failed(;); examinethe array for failed drives that need replacement;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqIdeDriveUltraAtaDegraded
item.description: An IDE drive detects an excessive number of Ultra ATAdata transmission errors between the hard drive and theprocessor;User Action; For best performance move Ultra ATA devices to theprimary controller and non Ultra ATA devices to the secondarycontroller; If errors still persist; consider replacing thestandard ;;;conductor IDE cable with an ;;;conductor Ultra ATAcable;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqIdeDriveOk
item.description: An IDE drive status has been set to ok;User Action; None;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqIdeDriveDegraded
item.description: An IDE drive status has been set to degraded;User Action; The drive should be scheduled for replacement;Refer to the appropriate Maintenance and Service Guide fordetailed information on a component replacement;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqIdeAtaDiskStatusChange
item.description: ATA Disk Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of an ATA disk drive; The variable cpqIdeAtaDiskStatusindicates the current disk drive status;User Action; If cpqIdeAtaDiskStatus is 'smartError(;)';'failed(;)' or 'ssdWearOut(;)' replace the drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqIdeAtaDiskSSDWearStatusChange
item.description: Solid State Disk Wear Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in theSSD wear status of a SATA physical drive; The variablecpqIdeAtaDiskSSDWearStatus indicates the current SSD wear status;User Action; If cpqIdeAtaDiskSSDWearStatus is 'ssdWearOut(;)';replace the drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoSWRunningStatusChangeTrap
item.description: This trap notifies the user that the running software has changed status; configuration status; or redundancy mode;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoProcessEventTrap
item.description: A monitored process has either started or stopped running;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoProcessCountWarning
item.description: A monitored process count has violated the thresholds set on cpqHoSWRunningCount

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoProcessCountNormal
item.description: A monitored process count has returned back to normal;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoGenericTrap
item.description: ;; This trap is a generic trap; and left undefined;"Generic trap;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoCriticalSoftwareUpdateTrap
item.description: This trap is a send to the user to notify him of a Critical Software Update;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoCrashDumpNotEnabledTrap
item.description: This trap is sent to the user to notify him that the Crash Dump is not enabled;This trap is not sent if cpqHoCrashDumpMonitoring is disabled;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoBootPagingFileTooSmallTrap
item.description: This trap is sent when the paging file size of the boot volume or the target volume of the memory dump file is too small to hold a crash dump;This trap is not sent if cpqHoCrashDumpMonitoring is disabled;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoMibHealthStatusArrayChangeTrap
item.description: A change in the cpqHoMibHealthStatusArray has occurred.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoBootPagingFileOrFreeSpaceTooSmallTrap
item.description: This trap is sent when the paging file size of the boot volume or the free space of memory dump target volume is too small to hold a crash dump;"A change in the cpqHoMibHealthStatusArray has occurred;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHoAppErrorTrap
item.description: An application has generated an exception; Specificerror information is contained in the variablecpqHoSwPerfAppErrorDesc;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHo2PowerThresholdTrap
item.description: ;; This trap notifies user of a power threshold breach;"Power threshold exceeded;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHo2NicSwitchoverOccurred2
item.description: This trap will be sent any time the configured redundant NICbecomes the active NIC;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHo2NicSwitchoverOccurred
item.description: This trap will be sent any time the configured redundant NICbecomes the active NIC;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHo2NicStatusOk2
item.description: This trap will be sent any time the status of a NIC changes tothe OK condition;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHo2NicStatusOk
item.description: This trap will be sent any time the status of a NIC changes tothe OK condition;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHo2NicStatusFailed2
item.description: This trap will be sent any time the status of a NIC changes tothe Failed condition;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHo2NicStatusFailed
item.description: This trap will be sent any time the status of a NIC changes tothe Failed condition;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHo2GenericTrap
item.description: ;; This trap is a generic trap; and left undefined;"Generic trap;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHo2AppErrorTrap
item.description: An application has generated an exception; Specificerror information is contained in the variablecpqHoSwPerfAppErrorDesc;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeThermalTempOk
item.description: The temperature status has been set to ok;The server's temperature has returned to the normal operatingrange;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeThermalTempFailed
item.description: The temperature status has been set to failed;The system will be shutdown due to this thermal condition;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeThermalTempDegraded
item.description: The temperature status has been set to degraded;The server's temperature is outside of the normal operatingrange; The server will be shutdown if thecpqHeThermalDegradedAction variable is set to shutdown(;);

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeThermalSystemFanOk
item.description: The system fan status has been set to ok;Any previously non;operational system fans have returned tonormal operation;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeThermalSystemFanFailed
item.description: The system fan status has been set to failed;A required system fan is not operating normally; The systemwill be shutdown if the cpqHeThermalDegradedAction variableis set to shutdown(;);

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeThermalSystemFanDegraded
item.description: The system fan status has been set to degraded;An optional system fan is not operating normally;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeThermalCpuFanOk
item.description: The CPU fan status has been set to ok;Any previously non;operational processor fans have returnedto normal operation;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeThermalCpuFanFailed
item.description: The CPU fan status has been set to failed;A processor fan is not operating normally; The server will beshutdown;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeThermalConfirmation
item.description: The server is operational again;The server has previously been shutdown due to a thermalanomaly on the server and has just become operational again;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeSysBatteryRemoved
item.description: The system battery condition has removed for the specified chassis and index location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeSysBatteryFailed
item.description: The system battery condition has been set to failedfor the specified chassis and index location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeResMemBoardRemoved
item.description: Memory board or cartridge removed;An Advanced Memory Protection sub;system board or cartridge hasbeen removed from the system;User Action; Insure the board or cartridge has memory correctlyinstalled and re;insert the memory board or cartridge back intothe system;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeResMemBoardInserted
item.description: Memory board or cartridge inserted;An Advanced Memory Protection sub;system board or cartridge hasbeen inserted into the system;User Action; None;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeResMemBoardBusError
item.description: Memory board or cartridge bus error detected;An Advanced Memory Protection sub;system board or cartridgebus error has been detected;User Action; Replace the indicated board or cartridge;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeResilientMemXorMemoryEngaged
item.description: Advanced Memory Protection XOR Engine Memory Engaged;The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has detected a memoryfault; The XOR engine has been activated;User Action; Replace the faulty memory;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeResilientMemOnlineSpareEngaged
item.description: Advanced Memory Protection Online Spare Engaged;The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has detected a memoryfault; The Online Spare Memory has been activated;User Action; Schedule server down;time to replace the faultymemory;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeResilientMemMirroredMemoryEngaged
item.description: Advanced Memory Protection Mirrored Memory Engaged;The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has detected a memoryfault; Mirrored Memory has been activated;User Action; Replace the faulty memory;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeResilientMemLockStepMemoryEngaged
item.description: Advanced Memory Protection LockStep Engine Memory Engaged;The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has detected a memoryfault; The LockStep engine has been activated;User Action; Replace the faulty memory;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeResilientAdvancedECCMemoryEngaged
item.description: Advanced Memory Protection Advanced ECC Memory Engaged;The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has detected a memoryfault; Advanced ECC has been activated;User Action; Replace the faulty memory;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHePostError
item.description: One or more POST errors occurred;Power On Self;Test (POST) errors occur during the serverrestart process;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeManagementProcReady
item.description: The Management processor is readyThe management processor has successfully reset and is now availableagain;User action; None

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeManagementProcInReset
item.description: The Management processor is currently in resetThe management processor is currently in the process of being resetbecause of a firmware update or some other event;User action; None

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeManagementProcFailedReset
item.description: The Management processor failed resetThe management processor was not successfully reset and is notoperational;User action; Reset the management procesessor again or re;flashthe management processor firmware;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeFltTolPwrSupplyDegraded
item.description: The fault tolerant power supply sub;system condition has beenset to degraded;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeEventOccurred
item.description: An event has occurred;User Action; None;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeCorrectableMemoryLogDisabled
item.description: Correctable memory error tracking disabled;The frequency of errors is so high that the error trackinglogic has been temporarily disabled; The cpqHeCorrMemLogStatusvariable indicated the current tracking status;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeCorrectableMemoryError
item.description: A correctable memory error occurred;The error has been corrected; The current number of correctablememory errors is reported in the variable cpqHeCorrMemTotalErrs;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHeAsrConfirmation
item.description: The server is operational again;The server has previously been shutdown by theAutomatic Server Recovery (ASR) feature and has justbecome operational again;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe5ResMemBoardRemoved
item.description: Memory board or cartridge or riser removed;An Advanced Memory Protection sub;system board or cartridge or riser hasbeen removed from the system; Value ; for CPU means memory is not processor based;User Action; Insure the board or cartridge or riser has memory correctlyinstalled and re;insert the memory board or cartridge or CPU back intothe system;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe5ResMemBoardInserted
item.description: Memory board or cartridge or riser inserted;An Advanced Memory Protection sub;system board or cartridge or riserHas been inserted into the system; Value ; for CPU means memory is not processor based;User Action; None;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe5ResMemBoardBusError
item.description: Memory board or cartridge or Riser bus error detected;An Advanced Memory Protection sub;system board or cartridge or Riserbus error has been detected; Value ; for CPU means memory is not processor based;User Action; Replace the indicated board or cartridge or Riser;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe5CorrMemReplaceMemModule
item.description: Corrected \ uncorrected Memory Errors DetectedThe errors have been corrected; but the memory module should bereplaced; Value ; for CPU means memory is not Processor based

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe4FltTolPowerSupplyOk
item.description: The fault tolerant power supply condition has been set backto the OK state for the specified chassis and bay location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe4FltTolPowerSupplyFailed
item.description: The fault tolerant power supply condition has been setto failed for the specified chassis and bay location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe4FltTolPowerSupplyDegraded
item.description: The fault tolerant power supply condition has been setto degraded for the specified chassis and bay location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe4FltTolPowerSupplyACpowerloss
item.description: The fault tolerant power supply AC power loss for the specified chassis and bay location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe4CorrMemReplaceMemModule
item.description: Corrected Memory Errors DetectedThe errors have been corrected; but the memory module should bereplaced;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3ThermalTempOk
item.description: The temperature status has been set to ok;The server's temperature has returned to the normal operatingrange;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3ThermalTempFailed
item.description: The temperature status has been set to failed;The system will be shutdown due to this thermal condition;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3ThermalTempDegraded
item.description: The temperature status has been set to degraded;The server's temperature is outside of the normal operatingrange; The server will be shutdown if thecpqHeThermalDegradedAction variable is set to shutdown(;);

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3ThermalSystemFanOk
item.description: The system fan status has been set to ok;Any previously non;operational system fans have returned tonormal operation;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3ThermalSystemFanFailed
item.description: The system fan status has been set to failed;A required system fan is not operating normally; The systemwill be shutdown if the cpqHeThermalDegradedAction variableis set to shutdown(;);

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3ThermalSystemFanDegraded
item.description: The system fan status has been set to degraded;An optional system fan is not operating normally;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3ThermalCpuFanOk
item.description: The CPU fan status has been set to ok;Any previously non;operational processor fans have returnedto normal operation;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3ThermalCpuFanFailed
item.description: The CPU fan status has been set to failed;A processor fan is not operating normally; The server will beshutdown;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3ThermalConfirmation
item.description: The server is operational again;The server has previously been shutdown due to a thermalanomaly on the server and has just become operational again;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3TemperatureOk
item.description: The temperature status has been set to ok in thespecified chassis and location;The server's temperature has returned to the normal operatingrange;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3TemperatureFailed
item.description: The temperature status has been set to failed in thespecified chassis and location;The system will be shutdown due to this condition;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3TemperatureDegraded
item.description: The temperature status has been set to degraded in thespecified chassis and location;The server's temperature is outside of the normal operatingrange; The server will be shutdown if thecpqHeThermalDegradedAction variable is set to shutdown(;);

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3PowerConverterRedundancyLost
item.description: The DC;DC Power Converters have lost redundancy for thespecified chassis;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3PowerConverterFailed
item.description: The DC;DC Power Converter condition has been set to failedfor the specified chassis; slot and socket;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3PowerConverterDegraded
item.description: The DC;DC Power Converter condition has been set to degradedfor the specified chassis; slot and socket;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3PostError
item.description: One or more POST errors occurred;Power On Self;Test (POST) errors occur during the serverrestart process; Details of the POST error messages canbe found in Integrated Management Log

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolPwrSupplyDegraded
item.description: The fault tolerant power supply sub;system condition has beenset to degraded;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolPowerSupplyRemoved
item.description: A Fault Tolerant Power Supply has been removed from thespecified chassis and bay location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolPowerSupplyInserted
item.description: A Fault Tolerant Power Supply has been inserted into thespecified chassis and bay location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolPowerSupplyFailed
item.description: The fault tolerant power supply condition has been setto failed for the specified chassis and bay location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolPowerSupplyDegraded
item.description: The fault tolerant power supply condition has been setto degraded for the specified chassis and bay location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolPowerRedundancyRestored
item.description: The Fault Tolerant Power Supplies have returned to a redundantstate for the specified chassis;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolPowerRedundancyLost
item.description: The Fault Tolerant Power Supplies have lost redundancy forthe specified chassis;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolFanRemoved
item.description: A Fault Tolerant Fan has been removed from the specifiedchassis and fan location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolFanRedundancyRestored
item.description: The Fault Tolerant Fans have returned to a redundant state forthe specified chassis;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolFanRedundancyLost
item.description: The Fault Tolerant Fans have lost redundancy for thespecified chassis;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolFanInserted
item.description: A Fault Tolerant Fan has been inserted into the specifiedchassis and fan location;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolFanFailed
item.description: The Fault Tolerant Fan condition has been set to failedfor the specified chassis and fan;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3FltTolFanDegraded
item.description: The Fault Tolerant Fan condition has been set to degradedfor the specified chassis and fan;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3CorrMemReplaceMemModule
item.description: A correctable memory log entry indicates a memory module needsto be replaced;The errors have been corrected; but the memory module should bereplaced; The error information is reported in the variablecpqHeCorrMemErrDesc;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3CorrectableMemoryLogDisabled
item.description: Correctable memory error tracking disabled;The frequency of errors is so high that the error trackinglogic has been temporarily disabled; The cpqHeCorrMemLogStatusvariable indicated the current tracking status;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3CorrectableMemoryError
item.description: A correctable memory error occurred;The error has been corrected; The current number of correctablememory errors is reported in the variable cpqHeCorrMemTotalErrs;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3CacheAccelParityError
item.description: A cache accelerator parity error indicates a cache moduleneeds to be replaced;The error information is reported in the variablecpqHeEventLogErrorDesc;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe3AsrConfirmation
item.description: The server is operational again;The server has previously been shutdown by theAutomatic Server Recovery (ASR) feature and has justbecome operational again;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe2CorrectableMemoryLogDisabled
item.description: Correctable memory error tracking disabled;The frequency of errors is so high that the error trackinglogic has been temporarily disabled; The cpqHeCorrMemLogStatusvariable indicated the current tracking status;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqHe2CorrectableMemoryError
item.description: A correctable memory error occurred;The error has been corrected; The current number of correctablememory errors is reported in the variable cpqHeCorrMemTotalErrs;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaTapeLibraryStatusChange
item.description: Tape Library Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of a tape library; The variablecpqDaTapeLibraryStatus indicates the current tape librarystatus; The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget indicatesthe SCSI ID of the tape library;User Action; If the tape library is failed; check the tapelibrary front panel;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaTapeLibraryDoorStatusChange
item.description: Tape Library Door Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe door status of a tape library; The variablecpqDaTapeLibraryDoorStatus indicates the current tape librarydoor status; The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget indicatesthe the SCSI ID of the tape library;User Action; If the tape library door is open; close the tapelibrary door;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaTapeDriveStatusChange
item.description: Tape Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of a tape drive; The variable cpqDaTapeDrvStatusindicates the current tape status; The variablecpqDaTapeDrvScsiIdIndex indicates the the SCSI ID of the tapedrive;User Action; If the tape is failed; check the tape andall SCSI connections;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaTapeDriveCleanTapeReplace
item.description: Tape Drive Cleaning Tape Needs Replacing;The agent has detected that an autoloader tape unit has acleaning tape that has been fully used and therefore needs tobe replaced with a new cleaning tape;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaTapeDriveCleaningRequired
item.description: Tape Drive Cleaning Required trap;The agent has detected a tape drive that needs to have acleaning tape inserted and run; This will cause the tapedrive heads to be cleaned;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaSpareStatusChange
item.description: Spare Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array spare drive; The variablecpqDaSpareStatus indicates the current spare drive status; Thevariable cpqDaSpareBusNumber indicates the SCSI bus numberassociated with this drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaPhyDrvThreshPassedTrap
item.description: Physical Drive Threshold Passed;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a factorythreshold associated with one of the physical drive objects ona drive array has been exceeded; The variablecpqDaPhyDrvBusNumber indicates the SCSI bus number associatedwith the drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaPhyDrvStatusChange
item.description: Physical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array physical drive; The variablecpaDaPhyDrvStatus indicates the current physical drive status;The variable cpqDaPhyDrvBusNumber indicates the SCSI bus numberassociated with this drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaPhyDrvSSDWearStatusChange
item.description: Solid State Disk Wear Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in theSSD wear status of a drive array physical drive; The variablecpqDaPhyDrvSSDWearStatus indicates the current SSD wear status;User Action; If cpqDaPhyDrvSSDWearStatus is 'ssdWearOut(;)'; replacethe drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaLogDrvStatusChange
item.description: Logical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array logical drive; The variablecpqDaLogDrvStatus indicates the current logical drive status;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaCntlrStatusChange
item.description: Controller Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array controller; The variablecpqDaCntlrBoardStatus indicates the current controller status;User Action; If the board status is generalFailure(;); theyou may need to replace the controller; If the board statusis cableProblem(;); check the cable connections between thecontroller and the storage system;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaCntlrPartnerStatusChange
item.description: Partner Controller Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of a drive array partner controller; The variablecpqDaCntlrPartnerBoardStatus indicates the current partnercontroller status; The variable cpqDaCntlrSerialNumber indicatesthe controller?s serial number and cpqDaCntlrPartnerSerialNumberindicates the partner controller?s serial number;User Action; Check the partner controller for problems; If lostcommunication with the partner controller is the result of a userinitiated action; no remedial action is required;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaCntlrActive
item.description: Controller Active;This trap signifies that the agent has detected that a backuparray controller in a duplexed pair has switched over to theactive role; The variable cpqDaCntlrSlot indicates theactive controller slot and cpqDaCntlrPartnerSlot indicates thebackup;User Action; Check the partner controller for problems;If this was the result of a user initiated switch over;no action is required;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaAccelStatusChange
item.description: Accelerator Board Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thecpqDaAccelStatus of an array accelerator write cache; Thecurrent status is represented by the variable cpqDaAccelStatus;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaAccelBatteryFailed
item.description: Accelerator Board Battery Failed;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a batteryfailure associated with the array accelerator cache board;The current battery status is indicated by thecpqDaAccelBattery variable;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDaAccelBadDataTrap
item.description: Accelerator Board Bad Data;This trap signifies that the agent has detected an arrayaccelerator cache board that has lost battery power; If datawas being stored in the accelerator memory when the server lostpower; that data has been lost;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa7SpareStatusChange
item.description: Spare Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array spare drive; The variablecpqDaSpareStatus indicates the current spare drive status;User Action; If cpqDaSpareStatus is 'failed(;)'; replace thedrive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa7PhyDrvStatusChange
item.description: Physical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array physical drive; The variablecpaDaPhyDrvStatus indicates the current physical drive status;User Action; If cpaDaPhyDrvStatus is 'failed(;)';'predictiveFailure(;)'; 'ssdWearOut(;)'; or 'notAuthenticated(;)';replace the drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6TapeLibraryStatusChange
item.description: Tape Library Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of a tape library; The variablecpqDaTapeLibraryStatus indicates the current tape librarystatus; The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget indicatesthe SCSI ID of the tape library;User Action; If cpqDaTapeLibraryStatus is 'failed(;)'; check thetape library front panel;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6TapeLibraryDoorStatusChange
item.description: Tape Library Door Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe door status of a tape library; The variablecpqDaTapeLibraryDoorStatus indicates the current tape librarydoor status; The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget indicatesthe the SCSI ID of the tape library;User Action; If cpqDaTapeLibraryDoorStatus is 'open(;)'; close thetape library door;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6TapeDriveStatusChange
item.description: Tape Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of a tape drive; The variable cpqDaTapeDrvStatusindicates the current tape status; The variablecpqDaTapeDrvScsiIdIndex indicates the the SCSI ID of the tapedrive;User Action; If cpqDaTapeDrvStatus is 'failed(;)'; check the tapeand all SCSI connections;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6TapeDriveCleanTapeReplace
item.description: Tape Drive Cleaning Tape Needs Replacing;The agent has detected that an autoloader tape unit has acleaning tape that has been fully used and therefore needs tobe replaced with a new cleaning tape;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6TapeDriveCleaningRequired
item.description: Tape Drive Cleaning Required trap;The agent has detected a tape drive that needs to have acleaning tape inserted and run; This will cause the tapedrive heads to be cleaned;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6SpareStatusChange
item.description: Spare Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array spare drive; The variablecpqDaSpareStatus indicates the current spare drive status;User Action; If the spare drive status is failed; replacethe drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6PhyDrvThreshPassedTrap
item.description: Physical Drive Threshold Passed;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a factorythreshold associated with one of the physical drive objectson a drive array has been exceeded;User Action; Replace the physical drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6PhyDrvStatusChange
item.description: Physical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array physical drive; The variablecpaDaPhyDrvStatus indicates the current physical drive status;User Action; If the physical drive status is failed(;) orpredictiveFailure(;); replace the drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6LogDrvStatusChange
item.description: Logical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array logical drive; The variablecpqDaLogDrvStatus indicates the current logical drive status;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6CntlrStatusChange
item.description: Controller Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of a drive array controller; The variablecpqDaCntlrBoardStatus indicates the current controller status;User Action; If cpqDaCntlrBoardStatus is 'generalFailure(;)'; youmay need to reboot the server or replace the controller;After the system is rebooted; check the variablecpqDaCntlrLastLockupCode for the controller?s last lockup code;If cpqDaCntlrBoardStatus is 'cableProblem(;)'; check the cableconnections between the controller and the storage system; IfcpqDaCntlrBoardStatus is 'cacheModuleMissing(;)'; the arraycontroller is operating in an unsupported configuration andrequires that a cache module be attached to the controller;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6AccelStatusChange
item.description: Cache Module Board Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of a cache module board; The currentstatus is represented by the variable cpqDaAccelStatus;User Action; If cpqDaAccelStatus is 'permDisabled(;)'; you mayneed to replace the cache module board; If cpqDaAccelStatus is'cacheModFlashMemNotAttached(;)'; install the flash memory;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6AccelBatteryFailed
item.description: Cache Module Board Backup Power Source Failed;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a backuppower source failure associated with the cache moduleboard; The backup power source is indicated bycpqDaAccelBackupPowerSource;User Action; Replace the Backup Power Source;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa6AccelBadDataTrap
item.description: Cache Module Board Bad Data;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a cachemodule board that has lost backup power; Ifdata was being stored in the cache module memory when theserver lost power; that data has been lost; The backup powersource is indicated by cpqDaAccelBackupPowerSource;User Action; Verify that no data has been lost;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa5PhyDrvThreshPassedTrap
item.description: Physical Drive Threshold Passed;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a factory threshold associated with one of the physical drive objectson a drive array has been exceeded;User Action; Replace the physical drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa5PhyDrvStatusChange
item.description: Physical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array physical drive; The variablecpaDaPhyDrvStatus indicates the current physical drive status;User Action; If the physical drive status is failed(;) orpredictiveFailure(;); replace the drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa5CntlrStatusChange
item.description: Controller Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of a drive array controller; The variablecpqDaCntlrBoardStatus indicates the current controller status;User Action; If the board status is generalFailure(;); youmay need to replace the controller; If the board status iscableProblem(;); check the cable connections between thecontroller and the storage system;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa5AccelStatusChange
item.description: Accelerator Board Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of an array accelerator cache board; The currentstatus is represented by the variable cpqDaAccelStatus;User Action; If the accelerator board status is permDisabled(;);you may need to replace the accelerator board;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa5AccelBatteryFailed
item.description: Accelerator Board Battery Failed;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a batteryfailure associated with the array accelerator cache board;User Action; Replace the Accelerator Cache Board;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa5AccelBadDataTrap
item.description: Accelerator Board Bad Data;This trap signifies that the agent has detected an arrayaccelerator cache board that has lost battery power; Ifdata was being stored in the accelerator cache memory when theserver lost power; that data has been lost;User Action; Verify that no data has been lost;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa4SpareStatusChange
item.description: Spare Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array spare drive; The variablecpqDaSpareStatus indicates the current spare drive status;User Action; If the spare drive status is failed; replacethe drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa4PhyDrvThreshPassedTrap
item.description: Physical Drive Threshold Passed;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a factorythreshold associated with one of the physical drive objects ona drive array has been exceeded;User Action; If the physical drive is predicting failure;replace the drive;

item.name: Alarm Notification For : cpqDa4PhyDrvStatusChange
item.description: Physical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array physical drive; The variablecpaDaPhyDrvStatus indicates the current physical drive status;User Action; If the physical drive failed or predictingfailure; replace the drive;

item.description: Physical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array physical drive; The variablecpaDaPhyDrvStatus indicates the current physical drive status;The variable cpqDaPhyDrvBusNumber indicates the SCSI bus numberassociated with this drive;

trigger.name: NIC-physical adapter in alogical adapter group changes to the Failed, But 1 NIC Ok
trigger.description: This trap will be sent any time a physical adapter in alogical adapter group changes to the Failed condition; butat least one physical adapter remains in the OK condition;;This can be caused by loss of link due to a cable beingremoved from the adapter or the Hub or Switch; Internaladapter; Hub; or Switch failures can also cause thiscondition;User Action; Check the cables to the adapter and the Hub orSwitch; If no cable problems are found; the adapter; Hub;or Switch may need replacement;

trigger.description: Physical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array physical drive; The variablecpaDaPhyDrvStatus indicates the current physical drive status;The variable cpqDaPhyDrvBusNumber indicates the SCSI bus numberassociated with this drive;

trigger.name: Da3-Logical Drive Status Change
trigger.description: Logical Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thestatus of a drive array logical drive; The variablecpqDaLogDrvStatus indicates the current logical drive status;

trigger.name: Da3-Accelerator Board Status Change
trigger.description: Accelerator Board Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in thecpqDaAccelStatus of an array accelerator cache board; Thecurrent status is represented by the variable cpqDaAccelStatus;

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Traps COMPAQ ILO:snmptrap["(\benterprises.232.0.3014$\b)"].str("enterprises.232.0.3014")}=1 & {Template SNMP Traps COMPAQ ILO:snmptrap["(\benterprises.232.0.3014$\b)"].nodata(3d)}=0
trigger.name: Da3-Accelerator Board Battery Failed
trigger.description: Accelerator Board Battery Failed;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a batteryfailure associated with the array accelerator cache board; Thecurrent battery status is indicated by the cpqDaAccelBatteryvariable;

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Traps COMPAQ ILO:snmptrap["(\benterprises.232.0.3013$\b)"].str("enterprises.232.0.3013")}=1 & {Template SNMP Traps COMPAQ ILO:snmptrap["(\benterprises.232.0.3013$\b)"].nodata(3d)}=0
trigger.name: Da3-Accelerator Board Bad Data
trigger.description: Accelerator Board Bad Data;This trap signifies that the agent has detected an arrayaccelerator cache board that has lost battery power; If datawas being stored in the accelerator memory when the server lostpower; that data has been lost;

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Traps COMPAQ ILO:snmptrap["(\benterprises.232.0.3031$\b)"].str("enterprises.232.0.3031")}=1 & {Template SNMP Traps COMPAQ ILO:snmptrap["(\benterprises.232.0.3031$\b)"].nodata(3d)}=0
trigger.name: Da2-Tape Library Status Change
trigger.description: Tape Library Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of a tape library; The variablecpqDaTapeLibraryStatus indicates the current tape librarystatus; The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget indicatesthe SCSI ID of the tape library;User Action; If the tape library is failed; check the tapelibrary front panel;

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Traps COMPAQ ILO:snmptrap["(\benterprises.232.0.3032$\b)"].str("enterprises.232.0.3032")}=1 & {Template SNMP Traps COMPAQ ILO:snmptrap["(\benterprises.232.0.3032$\b)"].nodata(3d)}=0
trigger.name: Da2-Tape Drive Status Change
trigger.description: Tape Drive Status Change;This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change inthe status of a tape drive; The variable cpqDaTapeDrvStatusindicates the current tape status; The variablecpqDaTapeDrvScsiIdIndex indicates the the SCSI ID of the tapedrive;User Action; If the tape is failed; check the tape andall SCSI connections;
